name: Labradorite gemstone bracelet
description:
These stunning gemstones are specially treated with a thin film of silver which is a special process these beautiful stones have undergone to give this labradorite rondelles and extra shinny shimmer of silver which only enhances their already beautiful gray and blue tones.
This is a double wrap Labradorite bracelet with hand crafted silver components to compliment the silver/gray/and blue tones of this stone. The bracelet is hand strung and knotted in various areas with a silk cord and also has the large sterling silver chain links to make the bracelet adjustable.

Sterling silver beads
Sterling silver components
Sterling silver chain
Sterling silver clasp

name: Wood Leaf necklace
description:
Tulsi is said to be India's most sacred plant. This long 23 inch Tulsi necklace carries a gentle female energy and is know as the queen of medicinal plants. For she is also a plant of power, a friend, a physician and an ally. When you have Tulasi around, you are protected, and she will bring beauty, health, elegance and grace into your life..... so it is said! For thousands of years this plant has been used for it's healing powers in Ayurveda. 

Details:
A hand forged solid sterling silver leaf measuring approx. 2.25 inches
Sterling silver flower beads
Hand cut Tulsi beads
Measures approx. 23 inches 
Silk Cord

Your personalized wish bracelet will come on a pretty gift card - individually wrapped.

The Card reads:

While putting on your bracelet, make a wish...
Once your bracelet wears off, your wish is ready to come true.

Bracelet measures 7 inches and is adjustable
Sterling silver charm personalized with an initial
Adjustable bead holds the bracelet in place


It is best to keep the waxed Irish linen away from water, if you want to keep it beautiful and so it doesn't age before it's time.

name: Double wrap waxed Irish linen bracelet in Butterscotch
description:
This is a listing for ONE *Double wrap in whipped Butterscotch* waxed irish linen bracelet

Carefully hand woven with butterscotch Irish linen and sterling silver beads- this bracelet will wrap around your wrist twice. It's a great bracelet to wear on it's own, combined with another color, or layered with any other of your favorite bracelets.

Bracelet measures approx. 14 inches 35.5 cm
Sterling silver beads
Sterling silver button clasp

The beads used for this bracelet are all seamless sterling silver in the highest quality and will not turn black after wearing them for only a couple of weeks! 

Note that Irish linen isn't designed to get wet, if you would like it to keep it's brilliant color and not age before it's time, keep it out of water. Having said that - I wear mine all the time. :)

Copyright protected 2009-2010 Bijouxbar
